name: The (Angry) Stewardess
description:
📖 Synopsis

Enough is enough! You are a stewardess who has had enough of your customers' impertinence and you have decided to take it out on everyone! Release your accumulated anger against your enemies and don't let your fury make you lose control.

⌨️ Controls

  • Arrow keys: Move around.
  • Q: Punch.
  • W: Kick.
  • E: Grab/throw a weapon

🏷️ External resources

Music:

  • Moskito - Quincas Moreira
  • Alex-Productions - Powerful Trap Beat | Strong

Sound effects: https://freesound.org

👨‍💻👩‍💻 Credits

Eric Valero (https://ervalero.itch.io): Programmer and character animator

Apolok (https://apolok.itch.io): Lead level designer and programmer 

Laureola (https://laureola.itch.io): Lead 2D artist

Zooky12 (https://kitoss.itch.io): Programmer and 2D artist
